name: freudjs
description: Simple component-like javascript library for when you don't need React, Vue, etc.

scripts.build: yarn run dist-clean && parcel build src/freud.js
scripts.test-build: yarn clean-test && NODE_ENV=production parcel build src/freud.js -d ./dist_test && NODE_ENV=production parcel build --no-minify spec/test.html --public-url './' -d ./dist_test

author: Achilleas Buisman
